name: A Long Rush
description: All players rush through Long Doors.
Flash and smoke Long Corner to avoid AWPs.
Control A site from Long, sometimes split with Cat.

name: Cat (Short) Split A 1
description: Execute smokes and flashes to take A from two angles.

name: Cat Split A 2
description: Catch long players from 2 vertical angles.

name: B Rush
description: Fast push through Upper Tunnels to overwhelm B site defenders.
Flash over roof, molotov back site/car.

name: Mid to B Split
description: Smoke CT spawn, flash over Mid, and collapse onto B from both sides.
Strong counter to CT setups with only 1 B defender.

name: Default / Map Control
description: Spread out: 1 Long, 2 Upper Tunnels, 1 Mid, 1 Cat.
Hold for pushes, get info, then collapse based on picks or utility.

name: X-Box Smoke + Short Control
description: Smoke Xbox from T spawn to block mid vision.
Take Cat control safely for an A Short execute.

name: B Execute (Navi)
description: 1 player goes suicide mid, smokes CT from Xbox, goes CT mid.
